question: 1. What is the generic version of the algorithm proposed by Michael called?
2. How does the ID3 algorithm determine when to stop building the tree?

options.A: A. When the problem is solved
options.B: B. When the training examples are perfectly classified
options.C: C. When the best attribute is picked
options.D: D. When the training set is perfectly classified

question: 3. What is the formula for calculating information gain?

options.D: D. Sum of probabilities times the log of the probabilities

question: 5. How does the ID3 algorithm determine the best attribute?

options.A: A. By maximizing the entropy gain
options.B: B. By minimizing the entropy gain
options.C: C. By maximizing the information gain
options.D: D. By minimizing the information gain
